alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 1:11AM PST until January 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin, and Western Mojave Desert. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Las Vegas Valley, Southern Clark County, and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects. Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert
